question: Which state has become the first to amend Industries (Facilitation) Act, for all Small, Medium & Large-Scale Industries?
explanation:
Karnataka becomes the first state to amend Industries (Facilitation) Act for all Small, Medium & Large-Scale Industries.
The amendments in the sections of the Karnataka Industries (Facilitation) Act 2002, removed the statutory nods required to begin construction and other works in the state. It allows the industries to commence work without clearances for first 3 years. 100% stamp duty exemption for agreements and other resources for production of electric vehicles (EV) will be given.
